### [495] [Concentrated real-pole uniform-in-time approximation of the matrix exponential](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.21858)
*Stefan Güttel,Shuai Shao*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种渐近最优的共享集中实极点选择方法，用于时间相关指数函数exp(-tz)的有理逼近，扩展了Andersson关于exp(-z)的经典结果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 时间相关指数函数exp(-tz)的有理逼近在数值计算中广泛应用，特别是在求解常系数线性初值问题时。现有的Andersson经典结果仅针对exp(-z)，需要扩展到更一般的时间相关情况，以支持不同时间区间和近似阶数的应用。

Method: 提出了一种渐近最优的共享集中实极点选择策略，用于构造exp(-tz)的有理逼近族。该方法扩展了Andersson的经典结果，考虑了时间参数t在正时间区间T内的变化，并保持了极点的集中特性。

Result: 数值实验表明，所提出的极点选择在各种时间范围和近似阶数（从小到大的阶数）下都表现出接近最优的性能。该方法还被成功应用于常系数线性初值问题的均匀时间有理逼近。

Conclusion: 本文成功扩展了Andersson的经典结果，为时间相关指数函数提供了渐近最优的有理逼近极点选择方法，在数值计算中具有实际应用价值，特别是在求解常微分方程初值问题时。

Abstract: We propose an asympotically optimal choice of shared concentrated real poles of a family of rational approximants of time-dependent exponential functions $\exp(-tz)$ for $z \geq 0$ and $t$ in a positive time interval $T$. Our result extends a classical result by J.-E.Andersson [J.Approx.Theory, 32(2):85--95, 1981] on the asymptotic best rational approximation of $\exp(-z)$ with real poles. Numerical experiments demonstrate the near-optimality of our choice for various time ranges and for both small and large approximation degrees. An application of the uniform-in-time rational approximation using our proposed concentrated real poles to a linear constant-coefficient initial-value problem is also discussed.

</details>


### [496] [Pressure-robust optimally convergent H(div) finite element method without the commuting diagram property for the steady Oseen equations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.21996)
*Jin Zhang,Xiaowei Liu*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 该论文为H(div)-相容有限元方法应用于稳态Oseen问题建立了收敛理论，特别关注精确有限元复形成立但交换图性质可能失效的情况。方法引入涡度稳定化确保速度误差的最优阶收敛，尤其适用于对流主导情形。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统有限元方法在求解Oseen问题时，特别是对流主导的高雷诺数情形，需要满足交换图性质才能保证收敛。然而许多实际有用的有限元对（如Stenberg元）虽然满足精确有限元复形要求，却可能违反交换图性质。本文旨在为这类方法建立收敛理论，扩展可用有限元选择范围。

Method: 采用H(div)-相容有限元方法，结合涡度稳定化处理对流项。理论分析基于精确de Rham复形和有限元复形框架，该框架使得速度误差估计不依赖于离散inf-sup常数。以Stenberg有限元作为代表性示例，该方法不需要交换图性质即可保证收敛。

Result: 建立了不依赖交换图性质的收敛理论，证明了速度误差的最优阶收敛。Stenberg元展示了该方法的多重优势：压力鲁棒性、比经典RT或BDM元更少的自由度（由于顶点连续性）、以及无需交换图性质即可收敛。

Conclusion: 该理论框架为违反交换图性质的有限元对提供了收敛保证，扩展了不可压缩流体问题（特别是高雷诺数情形）的高效离散化选择范围，为开发更高效的计算方法开辟了新可能性。

Abstract: This work develops a convergence theory for H(div)-conforming finite element methods applied to the steady Oseen problem, focusing on cases where the exact finite element complex holds while the commuting diagram property may fail. The proposed method incorporates vorticity stabilization to ensure optimal-order convergence of the velocity error, especially for convection-dominated cases. As a crucial component of the analysis, exact de Rham and finite element complexes provide a framework whose utility includes establishing velocity error estimates independent of the discrete inf-sup constant. As a representative example, Stenberg finite elements demonstrate the framework's validity and offer several computational advantages: pressure robustness, fewer degrees of freedom than classical RT or BDM elements due to vertex continuity, and convergence without requiring the commuting diagram property. Moreover, the proposed methodology is applicable to a class of finite element pairs that violate the commuting diagram property, thereby offering new possibilities for efficient discretizations of incompressible fluid problems, particularly in high Reynolds number regimes.

</details>


### [497] [BDF2-type integrator for Landau-Lifshitz-Gilbert equation in micromagnetics, part I: unconditional weak convergence to weak solutions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22000)
*Michele Aldé,Michael Feischl,Dirk Praetorius*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出一种求解Landau-Lifshitz-Gilbert方程的全离散方法，结合空间一阶有限元和时间BDF2格式，每步只需解一个线性系统，证明无条件稳定且收敛到弱解。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: LLG方程描述微磁现象，需要高效稳定的数值方法。现有方法可能计算复杂或稳定性不足，需要开发每步只需解一个线性系统的无条件稳定格式。

Method: 空间采用一阶有限元离散，时间采用BDF2型两步法。每时间步只需解一个线性系统，通过时间线性插值重构离散时空磁化强度。

Result: 证明该积分器无条件稳定，重构磁化强度的子序列在时空域中弱收敛于LLG的弱解。数值实验验证空间一阶精度、时间二阶精度。

Conclusion: 提出了一种高效稳定的LLG方程全离散方法，理论保证收敛性，数值验证精度，为微磁模拟提供了可靠的计算工具。

Abstract: We consider the Landau-Lifshitz-Gilbert equation (LLG) that models time-dependent micromagnetic phenomena. We propose a full discretization that employs first-order finite elements in space and a BDF2-type two-step method in time. In each time step, only one linear system of equations has to be solved. We employ linear interpolation in time to reconstruct the discrete space-time magnetization. We prove that the integrator is unconditionally stable and thus guarantees that a subsequence of the reconstructed magnetization converges weakly in $H^1$ towards a weak solution of LLG in the space-time domain. Numerical experiments verify that the proposed integrator is indeed first-order in space and second-order in time.

</details>


### [498] [Broken-FEEC on multipatch domains with local refinements](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22206)
*Martin Campos Pinto,Frederik Schnack*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出了一种用于局部细化样条空间和非匹配界面的broken-FEEC新方法，通过保持矩的离散保形投影算子消除数值伪影，实现能量守恒的Maxwell求解器。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统broken-FEEC方法在处理局部细化时会产生数值伪影，需要开发能够保持高阶多项式矩的投影算子来解决非匹配界面处的连续性问题。

Method: 开发了矩保持的离散保形投影算子，这些算子具有显式、局部化和度量无关的特性，确保在非匹配界面处保持H¹和H(curl)连续性，同时保持高阶多项式矩。

Result: 实现了broken-FEEC de Rham序列，具有精确的强导数和弱导数，得到了能量守恒的Maxwell求解器，这些求解器是显式的且几乎没有伪模式。数值模拟证实了该方法能有效消除伪波。

Conclusion: 该方法成功扩展了broken-FEEC到局部细化样条空间，通过矩保持投影算子解决了非匹配界面问题，为Maxwell方程求解提供了高效、准确的数值方法。

Abstract: This article introduces a novel approach for broken-FEEC (Finite Element Exterior Calculus), extending its application to locally refined spline spaces with non-matching interfaces. Traditional broken-FEEC allows for discontinuous discretizations at patch interfaces, preserving the de Rham structure and offering computational benefits. However, local refinements often lead to numerical artifacts. Our solution involves developing moment-preserving discrete conforming projection operators. These operators are explicit, localized, and metric-independent, ensuring $H^1$ and $H(\text{curl})$ continuity across non-matching interfaces while preserving high-order polynomial moments. This results in broken-FEEC de Rham sequences with accurate strong and weak derivatives, leading to energy-preserving Maxwell solvers that are explicit and virtually free of spurious modes. Numerical simulations confirm the efficacy of our method in eliminating spurious waves.

</details>


### [499] [The Reduced Basis Multigrid scheme for the Virtual Element Method](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22219)
*Paola F. Antonietti,Silvia Bertoluzza,Fabio Credali*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出一种用于多边形网格上最低阶虚拟元方法的非嵌套W循环多重网格方案，通过简化基方法计算虚拟基函数构建完全相容辅助空间，避免虚拟元空间隐式定义带来的网格间算子计算问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 虚拟元方法在多边形网格上应用时，其空间的隐式定义给多重网格方法中的网格间算子计算带来困难，需要解决这一问题以实现高效的多重网格求解器。

Method: 使用简化基方法廉价计算虚拟基函数，构建完全相容的辅助空间，在此基础上设计非嵌套W循环多重网格方案，避免直接处理虚拟元空间的隐式定义。

Result: 成功实现了多边形网格上虚拟元方法的多重网格求解器，通过辅助空间方法有效解决了网格间算子计算问题，提高了计算效率。

Conclusion: 提出的非嵌套W循环多重网格方案为虚拟元方法提供了高效的多重网格求解器，通过简化基方法构建辅助空间有效克服了虚拟元空间隐式定义带来的计算挑战。

Abstract: We present a non-nested W-cycle multigrid scheme for the lowest order Virtual Element Method on polygonal meshes. To avoid the implicit definition of the Virtual Element space, which poses several issues in the computation of intergrid operators that underpin multigrid methods, the proposed scheme uses a fully-conforming auxiliary space constructed by cheaply computing the virtual basis functions via the reduced basis method.

</details>


### [500] [High-Order Asymptotic-Preserving IMEX schemes for an ES-BGK model for Gas Mixtures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22304)
*Domenico Caparello,Lorenzo Pareschi,Thomas Rey*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 本文构建了用于气体混合物ES-BGK模型的高阶渐近保持(AP)隐式-显式(IMEX)格式，该格式完全显式、对Knudsen数均匀稳定，在流体区域退化为混合物宏观方程的一致高阶求解器。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 扩展单组分BGK模型的IMEX策略到多组分ES-BGK模型，解决松弛项带来的刚度问题，开发能够处理任意数量组分、在不同流态下保持准确性的数值方法。

Method: 基于Filbet和Jin的IMEX策略，构建时间离散方案；结合三阶时间积分、CWENO3有限体积空间重构、离散速度空间中宏观矩的精确守恒，以及多线程实现；时间步长仅受双曲CFL条件约束。

Result: 方法实现了完全显式、对Knudsen数均匀稳定，在流体区域退化为混合物宏观方程的一致高阶求解器；数值测试验证了AP性质和正确渐近行为，展示了在多维气体混合物动力学测试中的准确性和鲁棒性。

Conclusion: 成功构建了用于气体混合物ES-BGK模型的高阶AP IMEX格式，能够处理任意数量组分，在不同流态下保持数值稳定性和准确性，为气体混合物动力学模拟提供了有效的数值工具。

Abstract: In this work we construct a high-order Asymptotic-Preserving (AP) Implicit-Explicit (IMEX) scheme for the ES-BGK model for gas mixtures introduced in [Brull, Commun. Math. Sci., 2015]. The time discretization is based on the IMEX strategy proposed in [Filbet, Jin, J. Sci. Comput., 2011] for the single-species BGK model and is here extended to the multi-species ES-BGK setting. The resulting method is fully explicit, uniformly stable with respect to the Knudsen number and, in the fluid regime, it reduces to a consistent and high-order accurate solver for the limiting macroscopic equations of the mixture. The IMEX structure removes the stiffness associated with the relaxation term so that the time step is constrained only by a hyperbolic CFL condition. The full solver couples a high-order space and velocity discretization that includes third-order time integration, a CWENO3 finite-volume reconstruction in space, exact conservation of macroscopic moments in the discrete velocity space, and a multithreaded implementation. The proposed approach can handle an arbitrary number of species. Its accuracy and robustness are demonstrated on a set of multidimensional kinetic tests for gas mixtures, where the AP property and the correct asymptotics are numerically verified across different regimes.

</details>


### [501] [Weyl distributions, spectral properties, and circulant approximation results for quaternion block multilevel Toeplitz matrix sequences](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22422)
*Ayoub Lailoune,Valerio Loi,Stefano Serra-Capizzano*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 本文系统研究了单轴四元数块多层Toeplitz矩阵序列的Weyl特征值和奇异值分布，并建立了四元数矩阵序列的近似类概念，为大规模四元数线性系统的快速预条件方法奠定基础。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现代应用中产生的大规模四元数线性系统需要高效的数值解法，特别是预条件技术。然而，四元数矩阵序列的理论工具（如近似类序列）尚未充分发展，这限制了相关算法的设计和分析。

Method: 1. 将近似类序列概念扩展到四元数矩阵序列；2. 研究四元数块多层Toeplitz矩阵序列的Weyl特征值和奇异值分布；3. 以四元数块多层循环矩阵序列作为Toeplitz矩阵序列的近似类；4. 通过低范数加低秩分解分析矩阵与预条件子的差异。

Result: 建立了四元数矩阵序列的近似类理论框架，证明了四元数块多层循环矩阵序列可作为Toeplitz矩阵序列的有效近似类，为设计快速预条件方法提供了理论基础，并通过数值实验验证了方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 本文发展了四元数矩阵序列的谱分布理论和近似类概念，为处理现代应用中大规模四元数线性系统的快速预条件方法提供了坚实的数学基础，并指出了未来研究方向。

Abstract: The present work contains a comprehensive treatment of Weyl eigenvalue and singular value distributions for single-axis quaternion block multilevel Toeplitz matrix sequences generated by $s\times t$ quaternion matrix-valued, $d$-variate, Lebesgue integrable generating functions. Furthermore, in view of concrete applications, we are interested in preconditioning and matrix approximation results. To this end, a crucial step is the extension of the notion of an approximating class of sequences (a.c.s.) to the case of matrix sequences with quaternion entries, since it allows us to decompose the difference between a matrix and its preconditioner into low-norm plus (relatively) low-rank terms. As a specific example, we consider classes of quaternion block multilevel circulant matrix sequences as an a.c.s. for quaternion block multilevel Toeplitz matrix sequences. These approximation results lay the foundations for fast preconditioning methods when dealing with large quaternion linear systems stemming from modern applications. We conclude our study with numerical experiments and directions for future research.

</details>

<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 带滞后的偏微分方程数值研究主要集中在模拟上，缺乏数值误差分析，且主要依赖无导数非线性求解器

Conclusion: 该工作填补了带滞后PDE数值误差分析的空白，提出的求解器能有效处理非光滑非线性代数系统，具有全局收敛性和局部二次收敛性

Abstract: Numerical investigations of partial differential equations with hysteresis have largely focused on simulations, leaving numerical error analysis unexplored and relying mainly on derivative-free nonlinear solvers. This work establishes rigorous finite element error estimates for the backward Euler fully discrete scheme applied to semilinear and quasilinear parabolic equations involving continuous hysteresis operators. To efficiently handle the inherent nonsmoothness of the resulting nonlinear algebraic systems, we develop a damped smoothing Newton solver under a general condition on the smoothing approximation, ensuring global convergence together with local Q-quadratic convergence. Numerical experiments confirm the theoretical convergence rates for semilinear problems, while showing higher-than-predicted orders for quasilinear ones. The robustness and efficiency of the proposed solver are further demonstrated in comparison with existing methods.

</details>


### [503] [Piecewise polynomial approximation on non-Lipschitz domains](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22628)
*D P Hewett*

Main category: math.NA

  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统逼近理论通常要求域和网格具有Lipschitz边界，但实际应用中常遇到非Lipschitz边界（如分形边界）的情况。本文旨在扩展逼近理论到更一般的非Lipschitz设置。

Result: 证明了在非Lipschitz域和非Lipschitz网格设置下，不连续分段多项式在分式Sobolev空间中的最佳逼近误差估计。

Conclusion: 本文扩展了逼近理论到更一般的几何设置，为具有分形边界等非Lipschitz特征的域上的数值方法提供了理论基础。

Abstract: We prove best approximation error estimates for discontinuous piecewise polynomial approximation in fractional Sobolev spaces on non-Lipschitz meshes of non-Lipschitz domains. In particular, the boundary of the domain, and the boundaries of the mesh elements, can be fractal.

</details>


### [504] [Low-rank cross approximation of function-valued tensors for reduced-order modeling of parametric PDEs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22650)

  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 参数化偏微分方程的参数-解映射通常具有高维性，传统模型降阶方法面临挑战。函数值张量提供了一种自然表示参数化PDE解的方式，但缺乏代数结构。研究旨在开发适用于函数值张量的低秩逼近方法，实现高效的非侵入式模型降阶。

Method: 将函数值张量视为抽象希尔伯特空间中的多维数组，利用几何内积结构引入Tucker秩、高阶SVD和Tucker交叉分解。开发自适应交叉逼近算法计算函数值张量的低秩近似，构建非线性编码器和多线性解码器的编码-解码方案。

Result: 成功建立了函数值张量的低秩逼近理论框架，开发了有效的自适应交叉逼近算法。将该方法应用于两个非线性参数化PDE系统的模型降阶，数值实验验证了所提非侵入式逼近方法的性能。

Conclusion: 几何内积结构足以支持函数值张量的低秩分解，无需完整的代数场结构。提出的框架为参数化PDE的模型降阶提供了有效的非侵入式方法，实现了非线性编码与多线性解码的高效组合。

Abstract: The paper considers function-valued tensors, viewed as multidimensional arrays with entries in an abstract Hilbert space. Despite the absence of the algebraic structure of a field, the geometric inner-product structure suffices to introduce the Tucker rank, higher-order SVD, and Tucker-cross decomposition for function-valued tensors. An adaptive cross-approximation algorithm is developed to compute low-rank approximations of such tensors. The framework is motivated by, and applied to, model order reduction of the parameter-to-solution map for a parametric PDE. The resulting reduced-order model can be interpreted as an encoder-decoder scheme with a nonlinear encoder and a multilinear decoder. The performance of the proposed non-intrusive approximation method is demonstrated in numerical examples for two nonlinear parametric PDE systems.

</details>


### [505] [A High-Order Localized Orthogonal Decomposition Method for Heterogeneous Stokes Problems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22684)

<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 针对异质Stokes问题，需要开发高阶多尺度方法以更精确地捕捉复杂介质中的流动行为，同时改进现有方法的局部化策略和压力重构精度。

Method: 基于局部正交分解方法，设计关键的兴趣量函数，通过问题自适应基函数的局部化计算，实现高阶收敛。基函数支持域随精度要求对数增长。

Result: 证明了问题自适应基函数的指数衰减性，支持局部化计算。严格的先验误差分析表明，当基函数支持域随精度对数增长时，速度和压力均实现高阶收敛。数值实验验证了理论结果。

Conclusion: 提出的高阶多尺度方法成功解决了异质Stokes问题，在最小结构假设下实现了最优收敛性能，改进了局部化策略和压力重构，为复杂介质中的流动模拟提供了有效工具。

Abstract: In this paper, we propose a high-order extension of the multiscale method introduced by the authors in [SIAM J. Numer. Anal., 63(4) (2025), pp. 1617--1641] for heterogeneous Stokes problems, while also providing several other improvements, including a better localization strategy and a more precise pressure reconstruction. The proposed method is based on the Localized Orthogonal Decomposition methodology and achieves optimal convergence orders under minimal structural assumptions on the coefficients. A key feature of our approach is the careful design of so-called quantities of interest, defining functionals of the solution whose values the multiscale approximation aims to reproduce exactly. Their selection is particularly delicate in the context of Stokes problems due to potential conflicts arising from the divergence-free constraint. We prove the exponential decay of the problem-adapted basis functions, justifying their localized computation in practical implementations. A rigorous a priori error analysis proves high-order convergence for both velocity and pressure, if the basis supports grow logarithmically with the desired accuracy. Numerical experiments confirm the theoretical findings.

</details>


### [506] [A fifth-order absolutely convergent fixed-point fast sweeping hybrid alternative WENO scheme for steady state of hyperbolic conservation laws](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22790)
*Liang Li,Jun Zhu,Shanqin Chen,Yong-Tao Zhang*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种五阶混合快速扫描方法，用于求解双曲守恒律的稳态问题。该方法采用不等长子模板的AWENO格式，结合新颖的混合技术，比传统的等长子模板AWENO方法更容易达到绝对收敛，且比三阶TVD Runge-Kutta时间推进方法更高效。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 扩展Li等人关于绝对收敛定点快速扫描WENO方法的工作，设计更高效的稳态求解方法。传统快速扫描方法在应用AWENO格式时存在限制，需要开发能够灵活使用不等长子模板和任意单调数值通量的方法。

Method: 提出五阶混合快速扫描方案，采用定点快速扫描方法的显式特性，应用不等长子模板的AWENO格式作为局部求解器。设计新颖的混合技术，在局部求解器中结合非线性AWENO插值和线性方案，提高高阶快速扫描迭代的效率。

Result: 数值实验表明，所开发的不等长子模板定点快速扫描混合AWENO方法比原始等长子模板AWENO方法更容易达到绝对收敛（残差收敛到机器零/舍入误差），并且比流行的三阶TVD Runge-Kutta时间推进方法更高效地收敛到稳态解。

Conclusion: 成功开发了一种高效的五阶混合快速扫描方法，能够灵活使用不等长子模板和任意单调数值通量，在求解双曲守恒律稳态问题时表现出优越的收敛性和计算效率。

Abstract: In this paper, we extend the previous work on absolutely convergent fixed-point fast sweeping WENO methods by Li et al. (J. Comput. Phys. 443: 110516, 2021) and design a fifth-order hybrid fast sweeping scheme for solving steady state problems of hyperbolic conservation laws. Unlike many other fast sweeping methods, the explicit property of fixed-point fast sweeping methods provides flexibility to apply the alternative weighted essentially non-oscillatory (AWENO) scheme with unequal-sized substencils as the local solver, which facilitates the usage of arbitrary monotone numerical fluxes. Furthermore, a novel hybrid technique is designed in the local solver to combine the nonlinear AWENO interpolation with the linear scheme for an additional improvement in efficiency of the high-order fast sweeping iterations. Numerical examples show that the developed fixed-point fast sweeping hybrid AWENO method with unequal-sized substencils can achieve absolute convergence (i.e., the residue of the fast sweeping iterations converges to machine zero / round off errors) more easily than the original AWENO method with equal-sized substencils, and is more efficient than the popular third-order total variation diminishing (TVD) Runge-Kutta time-marching approach to converge to steady state solutions.

</details>


### [507] [A structure-preserving semi-implicit four-split scheme for continuum mechanics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23015)
*Michael Dumbser,Andrea Thomann,Maurizio Tavelli,Walter Boscheri*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出了一种新的结构保持顶点交错半隐式四分裂离散化方法，用于统一描述流体和固体材料的连续介质力学双曲系统，显著放宽了时间步长限制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有结构保持离散化方法虽然能保持旋度自由性质并与低马赫数极限一致，但热脉冲和畸变场的显式离散化仍需要基于剪切声速和热波速度的严格CFL稳定性限制，限制了计算效率。

Method: 将控制PDE系统分裂为四个子系统：i)显式处理的对流子系统；ii)隐式处理的热子系统；iii)包含动量、畸变场和特定热脉冲的隐式子系统；iv)隐式处理的压力子系统。采用顶点交错网格和半隐式离散化。

Result: 新方法仅需基于连续介质速度的温和CFL限制，显著放宽了时间步长要求。保持旋度自由性质，与低马赫数极限和刚性松弛极限渐近一致，并通过经典测试验证了理论性质。

Conclusion: 提出的四分裂半隐式方案成功克服了传统方法的严格时间步长限制，在保持结构保持特性的同时大幅提高了计算效率，为统一描述流体和固体材料的连续介质力学问题提供了高效数值方法。

Abstract: We introduce a novel structure-preserving vertex-staggered semi-implicit four-split discretization of a unified first order hyperbolic formulation of continuum mechanics that is able to describe at the same time fluid and solid materials within the same mathematical model. The governing PDE system goes back to pioneering work of Godunov, Romenski, Peshkov and collaborators. Previous structure-preserving discretizations of this system allowed to respect the curl-free properties of the distortion field and the specific thermal impulse in the absence of source terms and were consistent with the low Mach number limit with respect to the adiabatic sound speed. However, the evolution of the thermal impulse and the distortion field were still discretized explicitly, thus requiring a rather severe CFL stability restriction on the time step based on the shear sound speed and the finite, but potentially large, speed of heat waves. Instead, the new four-split semi-implicit scheme presented in this paper has a material time step restriction only. For this purpose, the governing PDE system is split into four subsystems: i) a convective subsystem, which is the only one that is treated explicitly; ii) a heat subsystem, iii) a subsystem containing momentum, distortion field and specific thermal impulse; iv) a pressure subsystem. The three subsystems ii)-iv) are all discretized implicitly, hence a rather mild CFL restriction based on the velocity of the continuum is imposed. The method is asymptotically consistent with the low Mach number limit and the stiff relaxation limits. Moreover, it maintains an exactly curl-free distortion field and thermal impulse in the case of linear source terms or in their absence. The scheme is benchmarked against classical test cases verifying its theoretical properties.

</details>


### [508] [Time Extrapolation with Graph Convolutional Autoencoder and Tensor Train Decomposition](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23037)
*Yuanhong Chen,Federico Pichi,Zhen Gao,Gianluigi Rozza*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种结合图卷积自编码器、张量分解和算子推理的降阶建模方法，用于参数化偏微分方程在复杂几何上的时间预测，特别关注外推性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 尽管图自编码器在处理复杂几何域方面具有优势，但在参数化动力系统的时间预测（特别是外推区域）中，同时需要时间因果性和参数空间泛化能力，这仍然是一个挑战。

Method: 结合图卷积自编码器（GCA）、张量分解（TT）和算子推理（OpInf）：1）通过张量分解将高保真快照表示为参数、空间和时间核心的组合；2）使用OpInf学习时间核心的演化；3）采用多保真度两阶段DeepONet框架，将空间和时间核心作为主干网络，参数核心作为分支网络。

Result: 数值实验（热传导、对流扩散和涡旋脱落现象）表明，该方法在复杂几何的动态学习方面表现出色，特别是在外推区域，性能优于MeshGraphNets等先进方法。

Conclusion: 该方法成功解决了图自编码器在参数化动力系统时间外推预测中的挑战，通过张量分解和算子推理的结合，实现了时间一致且泛化能力强的降阶模型。

Abstract: Graph autoencoders have gained attention in nonlinear reduced-order modeling of parameterized partial differential equations defined on unstructured grids. Despite they provide a geometrically consistent way of treating complex domains, applying such architectures to parameterized dynamical systems for temporal prediction beyond the training data, i.e. the extrapolation regime, is still a challenging task due to the simultaneous need of temporal causality and generalizability in the parametric space. In this work, we explore the integration of graph convolutional autoencoders (GCAs) with tensor train (TT) decomposition and Operator Inference (OpInf) to develop a time-consistent reduced-order model. In particular, high-fidelity snapshots are represented as a combination of parametric, spatial, and temporal cores via TT decomposition, while OpInf is used to learn the evolution of the latter. Moreover, we enhance the generalization performance by developing a multi-fidelity two-stages approach in the framework of Deep Operator Networks (DeepONet), treating the spatial and temporal cores as the trunk networks, and the parametric core as the branch network. Numerical results, including heat-conduction, advection-diffusion and vortex-shedding phenomena, demonstrate great performance in effectively learning the dynamic in the extrapolation regime for complex geometries, also in comparison with state-of-the-art approaches e.g. MeshGraphNets.

</details>


### [509] [A Path-Conservative Method for a Weakly Compressible Two-Phase Model with Surface Tension](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23095)
*Ashley Melvin,J. C. Mandal*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出了一种用于弱可压缩两相流模型的HLLC型路径守恒格式，包含毛细效应，无需单独离散表面张力项，结合局部重构实现高阶精度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 弱可压缩模型扩展到两相流时会产生非守恒系统，无法使用标准有限体积方法处理，需要开发新的数值方法。

Method: 开发了HLLC型路径守恒格式，包含毛细效应，结合局部解重构技术实现高阶空间精度。

Result: 在多个基准两相流问题上测试验证了方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 提出的路径守恒格式能够有效处理弱可压缩两相流问题，包含毛细效应，无需单独处理表面张力项，实现了高阶精度。

Abstract: When extended to two-phase flows, weakly compressible models lead to a non-conservative system, which precludes its treatment using standard finite volume techniques. In this paper, a novel HLLC-type path-conservative scheme is formulated for the weakly compressible two-phase model. Furthermore, capillary effects are included in the proposed path-conservative scheme, eliminating the need to discretize surface tension terms separately. The first-order path-conservative formulation is combined with a local solution reconstruction technique to obtain high-order spatial accuracy. The solver is tested on several benchmark two-phase flow problems to demonstrate its efficacy.

</details>


### [510] [Moment Approximations to Magnetic Rotating Shallow Flows](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23153)
*Julian Koellermeier,Michael Redle,Manuel Torrilhon*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 将浅水磁旋转模型扩展到高阶垂直矩，通过多项式展开保持垂直剖面信息，在保持计算效率的同时减少模型误差


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统磁旋转浅水模型通过深度平均损失了垂直信息，限制了预测能力。需要一种方法在保持计算效率的同时恢复垂直剖面信息。

Method: 使用高阶垂直矩方法，将水平速度和水平磁场的垂直剖面表示为任意阶多项式展开，通过Galerkin投影得到多项式系数的演化方程，构建扩展的2维系统。

Result: 数值实验显示，直到三阶的MRSW矩系统在不显著牺牲计算效率的情况下减少了模型误差。

Conclusion: 高阶矩方法成功扩展了磁旋转浅水模型，在保持计算优势的同时恢复了垂直剖面信息，提高了模型精度。

Abstract: Originally introduced to describe a transition region in stars, the magnetic rotating shallow water (MRSW) model is now used in many solar physics and geophysical applications. Derived from the 3-D incompressible magnetohydrodynamic system, the shallow nature of these applications motivates depth-averaging of both the velocities and magnetic fields. This is advantageous in terms of computational efficiency -- but at the loss of vertical information, thus limiting the predictive power of the MRSW model. To overcome this problem, we employ higher-order vertical moments, but now in the context of conductive fluids. In doing so, the new approximation maintains non-constant vertical profiles of both the horizontal magnetic fields and horizontal velocities, while still remaining in the simplified 2-D framework corresponding to depth integration. In this work, we extend the derivation of the shallow water moment equations to derive the MRSW moment system of arbitrary order; i.e., we represent the vertical profiles of the velocities -- and now additionally the magnetic fields -- by arbitrary-order polynomial expansions, and close the new expanded 2-D system with evolution equations for these polynomial coefficients, found via Galerkin projection. Through numerical experiments for MRSW moment systems up to third-order, we demonstrate that these moment approximations reduce model error without significantly sacrificing computational efficiency.

</details>


### [511] [Conservative and dissipative discretisations of multi-conservative ODEs and GENERIC systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23266)
*Boris D. Andrews,Patrick E. Farrell*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出了两种新的时间离散化方法：一种任意阶保守ODE方法，能保持所有已知不变量；另一种基于GENERIC格式的能量守恒-熵耗散方法，适用于ODE和PDE。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 热力学孤立系统的PDE通常具有守恒量（质量、动量、能量）和耗散量（熵）。在时间离散化中保持这些守恒和耗散定律，相比非结构保持方法，能以相同计算成本获得更好的近似。

Method: 采用系统引入辅助变量的策略，在离散层面复现守恒或耗散证明。提出了两种方法：(1) 任意阶时间离散化用于一般保守ODE，保持所有已知不变量；(2) 基于GENERIC格式的能量守恒-熵耗散方法，适用于ODE和PDE。

Result: 通过开普勒问题、Kovalevskaya问题、燃烧发动机模型和Benjamin-Bona-Mahony方程等数值算例，展示了所提近似方法的优势。

Conclusion: 通过系统引入辅助变量，在离散层面复现守恒或耗散证明的策略是有效的，能够开发出保持物理结构的时间离散化方法，相比传统方法在相同计算成本下获得更好的近似精度。

Abstract: Partial differential equations (PDEs) describing thermodynamically isolated systems typically possess conserved quantities (like mass, momentum, and energy) and dissipated quantities (like entropy). Preserving these conservation and dissipation laws on discretisation in time can yield vastly better approximations for the same computational effort, compared to schemes that are not structure-preserving. In this work we present two novel contributions: (i) an arbitrary-order time discretisation for general conservative ordinary differential equations that conserves all known invariants and (ii) an energy-conserving and entropy-dissipating scheme for both ordinary and partial differential equations written in the GENERIC format, a superset of Poisson and gradient-descent systems. In both cases the underlying strategy is the same: the systematic introduction of auxiliary variables, allowing for the replication at the discrete level of the proofs of conservation or dissipation. We illustrate the advantages of our approximations with numerical examples of the Kepler and Kovalevskaya problems, a combustion engine model, and the Benjamin-Bona-Mahony equation.

</details>


### [512] [A Multi-Phase Dual-PINN Framework: Soft Boundary-Interior Specialization via Distance-Weighted Priors](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23409)
*Naseem Abbas,Vittorio Colao,Davide Macri,William Spataro*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出双网络PINN框架，通过域网络和边界网络分解解函数，结合距离加权先验和两阶段训练策略，有效处理多尺度PDE中的尖锐梯度和复杂边界条件。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统PINN在处理具有尖锐梯度和非平凡边界条件的多尺度PDE时，物理残差和边界条件在优化过程中相互竞争，导致性能受限。

Method: 将解分解为u = u_D + u_B，其中域网络捕获内部动力学，边界网络处理近边界修正。使用距离加权先验(w_bd = exp(-d/τ))进行软专业化，并通过增强拉格朗日方法自动执行边界条件。采用两阶段训练：第一阶段均匀采样建立网络角色，第二阶段聚焦采样（如环采样）解决局部特征。

Result: 在四个基准测试（Fokker-Planck方程、Laplace方程、Poisson方程、1D波动方程）中，相比单网络PINN，误差减少36-90%，边界满足度提高21-88%，MAE降低2.2-9.3倍。

Conclusion: 该方法简单易实现，计算开销小，能广泛应用于具有尖锐解和复杂边界数据的PDE问题，通过软边界-内部专业化、退火角色正则化和两阶段课程学习显著提升性能。

Abstract: Physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) often struggle with multi-scale PDEs featuring sharp gradients and nontrivial boundary conditions, as the physics residual and boundary enforcement compete during optimization. We present a dual-network framework that decomposes the solution as $u = u_{\text{D}} + u_{\text{B}}$, where $u_{\text{D}}$ (domain network) captures interior dynamics and $u_{\text{B}}$ (boundary network) handles near-boundary corrections. Both networks share a unified physics residual while being softly specialized via distance-weighted priors ($w_{\text{bd}} = \exp(-d/τ)$) that are cosine-annealed during training. Boundary conditions are enforced through an augmented Lagrangian method, eliminating manual penalty tuning. Training proceeds in two phases: Phase~1 uses uniform collocation to establish network roles and stabilize boundary satisfaction; Phase~2 employs focused sampling (e.g. ring sampling near $\partialΩ$) with annealed role weights to efficiently resolve localized features. We evaluate our model on four benchmarks, including the 1D Fokker-Planck equation, the Laplace equation, the Poisson equation, and the 1D wave equation. Across Laplace and Poisson benchmarks, our method reduces error by $36-90\%$, improves boundary satisfaction by $21-88\%$, and decreases MAE by $2.2-9.3\times$ relative to a single-network PINN. Ablations isolate contributions of (i)~soft boundary-interior specialization, (ii)~annealed role regularization, and (iii)~the two-phase curriculum. The method is simple to implement, adds minimal computational overhead, and broadly applies to PDEs with sharp solutions and complex boundary data.

</details>


### [513] [LR B-spline perspective for RM B-splines: construction and effortless refinements](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23412)
*Francesco Patrizi*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: RM B-splines是LR B-splines的特例，这使得自动网格细化过程可以轻松实现


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: RM B-splines具有局部线性独立性和快速de Boor类评估算法，非常适合等几何分析应用。需要探索如何利用其特性实现自动网格细化。

Method: 通过观察RM B-splines是Locally Refined (LR) B-splines的特殊情况，建立自动网格细化程序

Result: 证明了RM B-splines可以视为LR B-splines的特例，从而可以直接应用现有的局部细化技术实现自动网格细化

Conclusion: RM B-splines与LR B-splines的关联性为自动网格细化提供了理论基础，简化了在等几何分析中的应用实现

Abstract: Reachable Minimally supported (RM) B-splines have been recently introduced as a novel B-spline--like basis. They feature local linear independence and admit a fast de Boor--like evaluation algorithm. These properties make them particularly attractive for applications in isogeometric analysis. In this note, we show that automatic mesh refinement procedures can be readily established by observing that RM B-splines are a special case of Locally Refined (LR) B-splines.

</details>


<div id='physics.flu-dyn'></div>

# physics.flu-dyn [[Back]](#toc)

### [514] [Predicting liquid properties and behavior via droplet pinch-off and machine learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.21847)
*Jingtao Wang,Qiwei Chen,C Ricardo Constante-Amores,Denise Gorse,Alfonso Arturo Castrejon-Pita,and Jose Rafael,Castrejon-Pitaa*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 机器学习通过液滴断裂瞬间的界面形态推断流体性质（粘度和表面张力），为传统测量方法提供替代方案


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统流体性质测量方法复杂耗时，需要探索基于机器学习的替代方案，利用液滴断裂过程中的物理信息来推断关键流体参数

Method: 使用高速成像记录牛顿流体液滴形成过程，提取断裂瞬间的轮廓图像，构建包含840个样本的数据集，训练监督回归模型预测流体参数，并进行无监督聚类分析

Result: 机器学习模型能够准确预测表面张力、粘度和液滴断裂形状，无监督聚类在Re-Oh和Bo-Oh平面上形成有意义的区域，表明潜在表示能揭示物理性质

Conclusion: 液滴断裂几何形态包含足够信息用于机器学习推断流体性质，该方法降低了测量复杂性、缩短了评估时间，便于自动化集成

Abstract: Here we demonstrate that the time-evolving interface observed during droplet formation, and consequently the resulting morphology nearing pinch-off, encode sufficient physical information for machine-learning (ML) frameworks to accurately infer key fluid properties, including viscosity and surface tension. Snapshots of dripping drops at the moment of break-up, together with their liquid properties and the flow rate, are used to form a data set for training ML algorithms. Experiments consisted of visualizing, using high-speed imaging, the process of droplet formation and identifying the frame closest to break-up. Experiments were conducted using Newtonian fluids under controlled flow conditions. In terms of the Reynolds (Re) and Ohnesorge (Oh) numbers, our conditions cover the domains 0.001< Re< 200 and 0.01 < Oh < 20, by using silicon oils, aqueous solutions of ethanol and glycerin, and methanol. For each case, flow parameters were recorded, along with images capturing the final stages of droplet break-up. Supervised regression models were trained to predict fluid parameters from the extracted contours of the breaking droplets. Our data set contains 840 examples. Our results demonstrate that the droplet geometry at pinch-off contains sufficient information to infer fluid properties by machine learning approaches. Our methods can predict surface tension, viscosity, or the droplet shape at pinch-off. These approaches provide alternatives to conventional methods to measure liquid properties while reducing measurement complexity and evaluation time and facilitating integration into automation. Unsupervised clustering is performed; the clusters represent regions in the Re-Oh and Bo-Oh planes, indicating that the latent representation may reveal physical properties and offering insight into droplet dynamics.

</details>


### [515] [Dynamic mixed turbulence modeling using a super-resolution generative adversarial approach](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.21879)
*Ludovico Nista,Christoph D. K. Schumann,Temistocle Grenga,Jonathan F. MacArt,Antonio Attili,Heinz Pitsch*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 提出动态混合超分辨率模型(DMSRM)，将传统动态混合模型与超分辨率GAN结合，通过生成超分辨率速度场计算亚网格应力，显著提升大涡模拟精度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统动态混合模型(DMM)在大涡模拟中难以准确预测亚网格应力和能量耗散，特别是在不同网格分辨率和更高雷诺数情况下。需要开发更精确、物理一致的湍流模型。

Method: 结合动态混合模型与超分辨率生成对抗网络(SR-GAN)，将网格过滤速度场上采样2倍，从超分辨率场直接计算尺度相似性和动态Smagorinsky贡献，形成DMSRM。

Result: DMSRM比传统DMM更准确地再现亚网格应力和能量耗散，在不同网格分辨率和训练未见的更高雷诺数下都能准确预测能谱和间歇性，产生物理一致的反向散射。

Conclusion: DMSRM通过SR-GAN生成物理准确的超分辨率场，实现了物理保真度、鲁棒性和计算效率的平衡，为大涡模拟湍流建模提供了有前景的替代方案。

Abstract: A dynamic mixed super-resolution model (DMSRM) for large-eddy simulations (LESs) is proposed, which combines the traditional dynamic mixed model (DMM) formulation with the generation of super-resolved velocity fields from which the subfilter-scale (SFS) stress tensor can be computed. A data-driven super-resolution generative adversarial network (SR-GAN) is employed to upsample the grid-filtered velocity fields by a factor of two, enabling the evaluation of both scale-similarity and the dynamic Smagorinsky contributions. A priori analyses of forced homogeneous isotropic turbulence show that the SR-GAN accurately reconstructs fine-scale flow features and generalizes well across different filter sizes and higher Reynolds number flow configurations, even for unseen input fields. The DMSRM reproduces SFS stresses and energy dissipation more accurately than the traditional DMM. A posteriori LES calculations further confirm that DMSRM predicts the energy spectrum and intermittency more accurately than DMM, even for different LES grid-scale resolutions and for higher Reynolds numbers than those used for training. Unlike DMM, DMSRM yields realistic backscatter and physically consistent SFS energy dissipation. These improvements arise from the physically accurate super-resolved fields generated by the SR-GAN, from which SFS stresses are directly computed. The result is a closure that accurately reproduces stress magnitudes and dissipation while reducing reliance on additional dissipation from the dynamic term. The DMSRM formulation achieves a balance of physical fidelity, robustness, and computational efficiency, offering a promising alternative to traditional DMMs for turbulence LES modeling.

</details>


### [516] [Droplet mobilization in actuated deformable tubes](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22007)
*Sthavishtha R. Bhopalam,Ruben Juanes,Hector Gomez*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究在可变形收缩管中油滴的驱动机制，比较流体动力驱动和动态壁驱动两种方式对液滴传输的影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探索在生物微流体应用中，通过可变形管的驱动机制精确控制液滴传输的可能性。

Method: 使用高分辨率流固耦合模拟，分析驱动频率和振幅对液滴通过收缩管传输的影响。

Result: 流体动力驱动导致液滴驱动时间随频率单调增加、随振幅减小；动态壁驱动在接近管共振频率时出现共振效应，驱动时间达到最小值。

Conclusion: 可变形管中的驱动机制在生物微流体应用中具有精确控制液滴传输的潜力。

Abstract: We study the mobilization of an oil droplet in a deformable, actuated constricted tube subjected to two different actuation mechanisms: hydrodynamic actuation (oscillatory body force in the fluid) and dynamic wall actuation (oscillatory traction on the tube walls). Using high-resolution fluid-structure interaction simulations, we analyze the effects of actuation frequency and amplitude on droplet transport through the constriction. Our simulations show that hydrodynamic actuation leads to a monotonic increase in the droplet's mobilization time with increasing actuation frequency, and a decrease with increasing actuation amplitude. In contrast, dynamic wall actuation exhibits a resonance effect-the mobilization time reaches a minimum at a frequency near the tube's resonant frequency. Our study highlights the potential of actuation mechanisms in deformable tubes for precise control of droplet transport in bio-microfluidic applications.

</details>


### [517] [An Efficient and Accurate Surrogate Modeling of Flapping Dynamics in Inverted Elastic Foils using Hypergraph Neural Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22012)
*Aarshana R. Parekh,Rui Gao,Rajeev K. Jaiman*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 开发了一种用于倒置翼型流固耦合问题的图神经网络代理模型，能够准确预测翼型在流体中的自激振荡，误差小于1.5%，为能量收集系统提供高效仿真工具。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 悬臂弹性翼型在流体中会产生大振幅自激振荡，可用于从稳定流中提取动能。但高保真仿真计算成本过高，难以用于设计优化所需的广泛配置空间探索。

Method: 采用旋转等变、准单体的图神经网络架构：通过本征正交分解压缩结构网格运动并用多层感知机推进，同时用GNN演化流场。扩展超图框架到柔性自激振荡翼型，捕捉涡动力学与结构运动的非线性耦合。

Result: GNN代理模型在数千个时间步长内预测翼尖位移和力系数的误差小于1.5%，准确再现主导涡脱落频率，能量传递指标误差在3%以内，表现出高精度和长期稳定性。

Conclusion: 开发了一种新的高效代理模型，可用于能量收集系统中非定常流固耦合动力学的长期预测，为设计优化提供计算效率高的仿真工具。

Abstract: Cantilevered elastic foils can undergo self-induced, large-amplitude flapping when subject to fluid flow, a widely observed phenomenon of fluid-structure interaction, from fluttering leaves or the movement of fish fins. When harnessed in steady currents, these oscillations enable the extraction of kinetic energy from the flow. However, accurately predicting these dynamics requires high-fidelity simulations that are prohibitively expensive to perform across the broad configuration space needed for design optimization. To address this, we develop a novel graph neural network (GNN) surrogate for the inverted foil problem, modeled as an elastically mounted rigid foil undergoing trailing-edge pitching in uniform flow. The coupled fluid-structure dynamics are solved using a Petrov-Galerkin finite element method with an arbitrary Lagrangian-Eulerian formulation, providing high-fidelity data for training and validation. The surrogate uses a rotation-equivariant, quasi-monolithic GNN architecture: structural mesh motion is compressed via proper orthogonal decomposition and advanced through a multilayer perceptron. At the same time, the GNN evolves the flow field consistent with system states. Specifically, this study extends the hypergraph framework to flexible, self-oscillating foils, capturing the nonlinear coupling between vortex dynamics and structural motion. The GNN surrogate achieves less than 1.5% error in predicting tip displacement and force coefficients over thousands of time steps, while accurately reproducing dominant vortex-shedding frequencies. The model captures energy transfer metrics within 3% of full-order simulations, demonstrating both accuracy and long-term stability. These results show a new, efficient surrogate for long-horizon prediction of unsteady flow-structure dynamics in energy-harvesting systems.

</details>


### [518] [Prediction performance of random reservoirs with different topology for nonlinear dynamical systems with different number of degrees of freedom](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22059)
*Shailendra K. Rathor,Lina Jaurigue,Martin Ziegler,Jörg Schumacher*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究探讨了储层计算中网络拓扑对称性对非线性动力系统预测性能的影响，发现对称性结构对某些系统（如热对流）预测有显著提升，但对高维混沌系统（如剪切流）影响很小。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 储层计算是预测非线性动力系统的强大框架，但储层拓扑结构（特别是连接性和权重的对称性）的作用尚未得到充分理解。本研究旨在探究网络结构如何影响RC在不同复杂度系统中的性能。

Method: 使用五种储层拓扑结构，独立控制连接模式和边权重，在四个复杂度递增的系统中评估：Mackey-Glass延迟反馈系统、两个低维热对流模型、以及一个三维剪切流模型（展现向湍流过渡）。评估包括直接预测和交叉预测任务。

Result: 对称储层网络显著提高了热对流系统的预测精度，特别是当输入维度小于自由度数量时。然而，剪切流模型由于强混沌高维动力学，对拓扑对称性几乎不敏感。

Conclusion: 储层网络的结构特性影响其学习复杂动力学的能力，对称性结构对某些系统预测有重要提升，但对高维混沌系统影响有限。这些发现为设计更有效的RC架构提供了指导。

Abstract: Reservoir computing (RC) is a powerful framework for predicting nonlinear dynamical systems, yet the role of reservoir topology$-$particularly symmetry in connectivity and weights$-$remains not adequately understood. This work investigates how the structure of the network influences the performance of RC in four systems of increasing complexity: the Mackey-Glass system with delayed-feedback, two low-dimensional thermal convection models, and a three-dimensional shear flow model exhibiting transition to turbulence. Using five reservoir topologies in which connectivity patterns and edge weights are controlled independently, we evaluate both direct- and cross-prediction tasks. The results show that symmetric reservoir networks substantially improve prediction accuracy for the convection-based systems, especially when the input dimension is smaller than the number of degrees of freedom. In contrast, the shear-flow model displays almost no sensitivity to topological symmetry due to its strongly chaotic high-dimensional dynamics. These findings reveal how structural properties of reservoir networks affect their ability to learn complex dynamics and provide guidance for designing more effective RC architectures.

</details>


### [519] [Influence of Fluid Rheology on Fluid Flow in a Natural Fracture Network](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22556)
*Cuong Mai Bui,Stephan K. Matthai*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究模拟非牛顿聚合物溶液在裂缝网络中的流动，揭示流体流变特性（屈服应力和剪切稀化）如何影响流动模式、连通性和压力-流量关系，强调在裂缝流动建模中必须考虑流体流变学。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 虽然非牛顿流变学在地下流体中被广泛认可，但在当前的裂缝流动研究中其存在和影响基本被忽略。需要研究非牛顿流体特性如何与裂缝几何形状和流体惯性相互作用。

Method: 使用Herschel-Bulkley-Papanastasiou方法模拟非牛顿流体特性（屈服应力和剪切稀化行为），在数米宽、毫米开度的裂缝网络上进行Navier-Stokes模拟，研究不同流量下的流动特性。

Result: 1. 低流量时，非屈服流体形成刚性区域，占据约65%的横截面积，降低裂缝流动连通性；2. 高流量时，剪切稀化促进惯性主导的流动，在裂缝交汇处形成环流；3. 屈服应力使流动局限于主要通道，而剪切稀化相比牛顿流体促进更广泛的流体分布；4. 观察到多峰速度分布和非线性压力降-流量关系。

Conclusion: 流体流变学显著影响裂缝网络中的流动模式、连通性和压力-流量关系，因此在裂缝流动建模中必须考虑非牛顿流体特性，否则可能导致对流动行为的错误预测。

Abstract: Non-Newtonian rheology is widely acknowledged in subsurface fluids, yet its presence and effects are largely ignored in current fracture-flow studies. Here, we simulate fracture flow of non-Newtonian polymer solutions on a several metre-wide millimetre-aperture network of fractures, examining the complex interplay between fluid rheology, fracture geometry, and fluid inertia. Non-Newtonian fluid characteristics, including a yield stress and shear-thinning behaviour, are modelled using the Herschel-Bulkley-Papanastasiou approach. For the investigated flow rates, our Navier-Stokes simulations reveal significant viscosity variations, resulting in complex flow patterns at both aperture- and network scale. At low rates, non-yielded fluid forms rigid zones occupying up to ~65% of the network cross-sectional area, reducing fracture flow connectivity. At high rates, shear-thinning promotes inertia-dominated flow with circulations near fracture intersections. Regarding flow partitioning, yield stress confines flow to dominant pathways while shear-thinning promotes a broader fluid distribution as compared with a Newtonian fluid. Observed multimodal velocity distributions and nonlinear pressure drop-flow rate relationships underscore that fluid rheology must be considered during fracture-flow modelling.

</details>


### [520] [U Net LSTM with incremental time-stepping for robust long-horizon unsteady flow prediction](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22730)
*Blaise Madiega,Mathieu Olivier*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 提出一种结合U-Net和LSTM的混合模型，通过预测物理场增量而非绝对状态来改进非定常CFD模拟的长期稳定性和精度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统瞬态CFD计算在长时间尺度和多尺度湍流模拟中计算成本高昂，而纯数据驱动的代理模型往往在多个时间步后性能退化或偏离物理规律。

Method: 采用增量时间步进的U-Net LSTM混合模型：U-Net编码器-解码器提取多尺度空间结构，LSTM层处理时间依赖性，网络训练于物理场的每步增量而非绝对状态，与经典时间推进方法对齐并减少累积误差。

Result: 该方法显著提高了长期稳定性（累积误差减少54.53%到84.21%），比标准学习基线更可靠地保持了工程指标、积分和平均量。

Conclusion: 该模型可作为混合CFD-ML管道的可行组件，在不损害定量保真度的前提下加速非定常模拟，特别适用于基于投影方法（如SIMPLE、PISO等）的求解器。

Abstract: Transient computational fluid dynamics (CFD) remains expensive when long horizons and multi-scale turbulence are involved. Data-driven surrogates promise relief, yet many degrade over multiple steps or drift from physical behavior. This work advances a hybrid path: an incremental time-stepping U Net LSTM model that forecasts unsteady dynamics by predicting field updates rather than absolute states. A U-Net encoder decoder extracts multi-scale spatial structures, LSTM layers carry temporal dependencies, and the network is trained on per-step increments of the physical fields, aligning learning with classical time marching and reducing compounding errors. The model is designed to slot into solvers based on projection methods (such as SIMPLE, PISO, etc), either as an initializer that delivers a sharper first guess for pressure-velocity coupling or as a corrective module that refines provisional fields. Across representative test cases, the approach improves long-term stability (54.53 to 84.21 % reduction of cumulative errors) and preserves engineering metrics, integral and averaged quantities, more reliably than standard learning baselines. These properties make it a plausible component of hybrid CFD-ML pipelines designed to accelerate unsteady simulations without compromising quantitative fidelity.

</details>


### [521] [Effect of cross-sectional anisotropy on shock train dynamics in supersonic internal flows](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.22770)
*Jagmohan Singh,Venkat Raman*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究椭圆管道纵横比对激波串动力学的影响，发现纵横比改变激波串形态但不显著影响壁面压力和总压损失


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究管道横截面形状（纵横比）对激波串动力学的影响，隔离形状引起的约束效应，理解几何形状如何影响超音速流动中的激波串结构

Method: 采用嵌入式边界方法结合自适应网格细化，在来流马赫数2.1条件下，保持横截面积和上游条件不变，改变椭圆管道纵横比（1.0到3.0），最高分辨率达48μm以解析激波串中的激波

Result: 增加纵横比显著改变激波串形态：离散激波单元数量减少，前缘激波沿长轴伸长而沿短轴收缩，圆形管道（AR=1.0）中明显的正激波干在AR=3.0时几乎消失；但壁面压力分布和总压损失对纵横比变化不敏感

Conclusion: 管道横截面形状控制激波串的详细结构，但流动减速和压力恢复的整体效率主要由湍流边界层施加的有效堵塞决定，而非纵横比本身，对于给定的质量流量和伪激波压力比

Abstract: This study investigates the effect of duct aspect ratio ($AR$), defined as the ratio of major to minor axis in an elliptical duct, on shock train dynamics for a freestream Mach number of 2.1. The aspect ratio $AR$ is varied from 1.0 to 3.0 while maintaining a constant cross-sectional area and identical upstream conditions, thereby ensuring the same inlet mass flow and nearly constant boundary-layer-induced blockage across all $AR$. This isolates shape-induced confinement effects. Simulations are performed using an embedded-boundary method with adaptive mesh refinement which enabled a finest resolution of 48$μ$m resolving the shocks in the shock train. The results show that increasing $AR$ significantly modifies the shock train morphology. The number of discrete shock cells decreases, and the leading shock front elongates along the major axis while contracting along the minor axis. The normal shock stem prominent in the circular duct (AR=1.0) nearly disappears at AR=3.0. Despite these morphological changes, the wall-pressure trace and stagnation-pressure loss remain largely insensitive to $AR$. These results indicate that while duct cross-section governs the detailed shock train structure, the overall efficiency of flow deceleration and pressure recovery is dictated primarily by the effective blockage imposed by the turbulent boundary layer, rather than the aspect ratio itself for a given mass flow rate and pressure ratio across the pseudo shock.

</details>


### [522] [Chiral Particles in Taylor-Couette Turbulence](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23279)
*Mees M. Flapper,Detlef Lohse,Sander G. Huisman*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究手性粒子在湍流泰勒-库埃特流中的行为，发现粒子动力学主要由流动主导，手性差异不明显


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探究手性粒子（破坏镜像对称性）在湍流泰勒-库埃特流中的行为，特别是在高雷诺数下是否仍能观察到低雷诺数时表现出的平动-转动耦合效应

Method: 使用大型手性粒子（约5mm）在湍流泰勒-库埃特流中进行实验，雷诺数范围9×10³到1.5×10⁵，密度匹配且处于稀薄状态（φ=1.7×10⁻⁴），通过追踪粒子的位置和方向来研究粒子-流体耦合

Result: 手性粒子紧密跟随泰勒涡结构，但左旋和右旋粒子在转动和方向动力学上没有差异；粒子动力学主要由流动主导，流动涡度决定了具体的粒子动力学

Conclusion: 在高雷诺数湍流中，手性粒子的平动-转动耦合效应不明显，粒子动力学主要由流动结构主导而非粒子手性

Abstract: This work investigates chiral particles, which break mirror symmetry, in turbulent Taylor--Couette flow. These particles generally display a translation-rotation coupling moving through a quiescent fluid. Here we performed experiments using large chiral particles (typical size \unit{5}{mm}) in turbulent Taylor--Couette flow, for Reynolds numbers $9\cdot10^3 \leq \text{Re} \leq 1.5 \cdot 10^5$. The density-matched chiral particles are studied in a dilute regime $(φ= 1.7 \cdot 10^{-4})$, where their location and orientation are tracked over time to investigate the particle-fluid coupling. We investigate whether the translation-rotation coupling observed at low Reynolds numbers is still observable over the measured high Reynolds numbers, using the tracked location and orientation. Similarly, we verify whether the chiral particles display a preferred location or orientation, and whether the left-handed and right-handed particles show different rotation statistics. The location data show that the chiral particles closely follow the structure of Taylor vortices. Hence, the orientation data and rotation data of the chiral particles are split between the Taylor vortices and particle chiralities. The results show no difference in rotation and orientation dynamics between chiralities. Rather, the particle dynamics are flow-dominated, where the flow vorticity determines the specific particle dynamics.

</details>


### [523] [Bursting bubbles in Herschel-Bulkley fluids: dynamics and jetting transitions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23345)
*A. H. Ghaemi,Z. Yang,A. Huang,V. Sanjay,J. Feng,C. R. Constante-Amores*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究将气泡在自由表面破裂的经典问题扩展到Herschel-Bulkley流体，通过数值模拟和实验验证，揭示了粘塑性、剪切稀化/稠化等非牛顿流变特性对气泡破裂动力学的影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统研究主要关注牛顿流体中气泡破裂的粘性、毛细和重力作用，但许多自然和工业过程涉及非牛顿流体。本研究旨在探索粘塑性流体中气泡破裂的动力学机制，填补这一研究空白。

Method: 采用直接数值模拟方法，并通过实验验证。系统研究了多个关键无量纲参数的影响，包括邦德数、奥内佐格数、剪切依赖行为和塑性毛细数，每个参数变化范围达几个数量级。

Result: 粘塑性强烈控制气泡破裂后空腔内毛细波的演化和相互作用；剪切稀化和稠化效应仅在中等奥内佐格数下显著；在高奥内佐格数下，自由表面动力学会收敛到非平坦平衡形状。

Conclusion: 研究揭示了粘度、重力、屈服应力和剪切依赖流变学在气液界面多相流中的耦合效应，对涉及非牛顿流体中气液界面的自然和工业过程具有广泛意义。

Abstract: When a bubble rises to a free surface, its bursting dynamics in Newtonian fluids are governed by the interplay between viscous, capillary, and gravitational forces. In this work, we extend this classical problem to Herschel-Bulkley fluids, elucidating the role of viscoplasticity and non-Newtonian rheology in bubble bursting. Using direct numerical simulations validated against experiments, we systematically explore the influence of the key governing dimensionless parameters, such as the Bond number, the Ohnesorge number, the shear-dependent behavior and the plastocapillary number, each varied over several orders of magnitude. Our results reveal that viscoplasticity strongly controls the evolution and interaction of capillary waves within the cavity formed upon bubble rupture. Shear-thinning and shear-thickening effects are significant only for moderate Ohnesorge numbers, while at large Ohnesorge values the free surface dynamics converge to a non-flat equilibrium shape once the internal stresses fall below the yield stress. These findings provide new insights into the coupled effects of viscosity, gravity, yield stress, and shear-dependent rheology in multiphase flows, with broad implications for natural and industrial processes involving gas-liquid interfaces.

</details>


### [524] [Bubble curtains in a lock-exchange flow: the importance of transient dynamics in the curtain-driven regime](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.23421)
*Shravan K. R. Raaghav,Ronald J. A. Driessen,Tom S. D. O'Mahoney,Rob E. Uittenbogaard,Herman J. H. Clercx,Matias Duran-Matute*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 气泡幕通过破坏盐水入侵的锁交换流动来减少盐分渗透，本文通过大涡模拟和半解析模型揭示了气泡幕有效性的时间演化规律。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 气泡幕用于减缓船闸中的盐水入侵，但需要量化其有效性随关键参数的变化关系，以指导实际应用。

Method: 采用多相大涡模拟重现实验中的突破和幕驱动两种运行状态，重点分析幕驱动状态，并结合模拟结果建立半解析模型。

Result: 模拟和模型清晰地描述了密度场和气泡幕有效性的时间演化，揭示了闸门开启后的时间间隔和瞬态动力学对有效性评估的关键作用。

Conclusion: 气泡幕的有效性高度依赖于时间演化过程，闸门开启后的时间间隔和瞬态动力学是决定其性能的关键因素。

Abstract: Bubble curtains are line bubble plumes that are used to mitigate saltwater intrusion in shipping locks. When the lock gate that separates the saline seawater from the fresh river water is opened, a lock-exchange flow is initiated. Placing a bubble curtain at the gate location disrupts this flow and reduces saltwater infiltration. For practical applications, it is useful to quantify the effectiveness of the bubble curtain as a function of the governing parameters of the problem. To achieve this goal, we performed multiphase large eddy simulations that accurately reproduce previous experimental results including the two regimes of operation: the break-through and the curtain-driven regimes. This paper focusses on the curtain-driven regime and aims to unravel the temporal evolution of the effectiveness of bubble curtains. The detailed spatial and temporal information obtained from the simulations and the flexibility to vary the governing parameters allowed us to overcome several previous experimental limitations. In addition, the simulations were used to obtain parameters to build a semi-analytical model. Both the simulations and the semi-analytical model clearly describe and help to understand the time evolution of the density field and the effectiveness of the bubble curtain. These results show that the time elapsed since the opening of the gate and the transient dynamics are crucial for determining the effectiveness of bubble curtains.

</details>
